comment:
Mash Schedule (calculate on grain temp when brewing, but...)
Strike grains with 4.47 gal of water at 167.8 °F.
Mash at 155 °F for 60 min.
Vorlauf and lauter 2.87 gal in your first runnings.
Add 2.63 gal of sparge water at 168 °F.
Vorlauf and lauter 2.63 gal in your second runnings.
Your combined runnings should be 5.5 gal.
